nz.govt.natlib.fx

Class IntegerElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.govt.natlib.fx.Element
      • nz.govt.natlib.fx.IntegerElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GifAspectRatioIntegerElement, WPMajorVersionIntegerElement

    public class IntegerElement
extends Element
    Can read an 'n' integers from a datasource. Any number of similar length integers and formats (hex, octal, binary etc...) can be read.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nic Evans

      • read

        public void read(DataSource data,
        ParserContext ctx)
          throws java.io.IOException
        The main method used by parsers top execute the functionality of the Element.
        Specified by:
        read in class Element
        Parameters:
        data - the source of the data to be parsed by this element
        ctx - the context of the parser, within which this element is being executed. Elements should output all significant parse events into this context.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Runtime - Exception if the match is not made.
